changeSet.sql: DELETE FROM usm_constant WHERE item='SBX Admin Side' AND item_value LIKE '%"label":"Workbench"%' AND item_value NOT LIKE '%"url":"./sandbox/config/workbench"%';

changeSet.author: Leap
changeSet.sql: UPDATE usm_constant SET item_value='{"label":"Configure","icon":"cog","url":"","children":[{"label":"Configuration Dashboard","icon":"assets/icons/Component_155_2.svg","url":"./iamp-btf/entity/config-screen","children":[],"_id":2},{"label":"Configuration Entry","icon":"assets/icons/icon_LaptopGatepass.svg","url":"./iamp-btf/entity/configuration-entry","children":[],"_id":3},{"label":"Key Words","icon":"assets/icons/icon_keywords.svg","url":"./iamp-btf/entity/key-words","children":[],"_id":4},{"label":"Schedule","icon":"assets/icons/icon-calendar.svg","url":"./iamp-btf/entity/schedule","children":[],"_id":5},{"label":"Server","icon":"assets/icons/Group_106664.svg","url":"./iamp-btf/entity/server","children":[],"_id":6},{"label":"Technology","icon":"assets/icons/icon_hint_idea.svg","url":"./iamp-btf/entity/technology","children":[],"_id":7},{"label":"Workflow Params","icon":"assets/icons/icon_flow_tree.svg","url":"./iamp-btf/entity/workflow-params","children":[],"_id":8},{"label":"Groups","icon":"users","url":"./iamp-btf/entity/group","children":[],"_id":9},{"label":"Tool Adapter","icon":"","url":"","children":[{"label":"Adapter Purpose","icon":"list","url":"./iamp-tad/adapterPurpose-list","children":[],"_id":11},{"label":"Adapter Config","icon":"cog","url":"./iamp-tad/adapterConfig-list","children":[],"_id":12}],"_id":10},{"label":"Technology Property","icon":"","url":"./iamp-btf/entity/technology-properties","children":[],"_id":13}]}' WHERE item_value LIKE '%Configure%' AND project_name='Core' AND item LIKE '%Bot Admin Side%'
